title: Google\Cloud\Channel\V1\ParameterDefinition
name: ParameterDefinition
description:
Parameter's definition. Specifies what parameter is required to use the current Offer to purchase.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.channel.v1.ParameterDefinition

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parameter_type
params.description: Data type of the parameter. Minimal value, Maximum value and allowed values will use specified data type here.

params.name: data.min_value
params.description: Minimal value of the parameter, if applicable. Inclusive. For example, minimal commitment when purchasing Anthos is 0.01. Applicable to INT64 and DOUBLE parameter types.

params.name: data.max_value
params.description: Maximum value of the parameter, if applicable. Inclusive. For example, maximum seats when purchasing Google Workspace Business Standard. Applicable to INT64 and DOUBLE parameter types.

params.name: data.allowed_values
params.description: If not empty, parameter values must be drawn from this list. For example, [us-west1, us-west2, ...] Applicable to STRING parameter type.

params.name: data.optional
params.description: If set to true, parameter is optional to purchase this Offer.
